post.text: Debate is over but the fight isn't. The FINAL FEC deadline for the entire campaign is minutes away at 11:59p! Donate now to make this a RECORD NIGHT. Contribute $10 >> DonaldJTrump.com/Debate

comment.author: Sammantha
comment.text: If she appoints more liberal judges to the Supreme Court - America might not survive this. She wants our 1st and 2nd amendments revised
